input.sentences: the baking date was fun for everyone .
they took time to take photos between mixing .
there were plenty of varieties of sweets to choose from .
a black and white photo was made to create a unique memory of the event .
output.sentences: A couple went to a fun date night learning baking recipes with other couples.
They took time to take photos together while the dough was mixing.
They stayed and talked with the other people for hours.
At the end of the night, there were plenty of varieties of sweets to take home.
They all took one final black and white photo together to end the unique night.
